Documentation for MAST’s openSAIL project: spec_plots¶

Contents:

  • Getting Started: Main Program
    • make_hst_spec_previews – Main driver.
  • The work horses: specutils*.py.
    • specutils – Utility functions used in plotting HST spectra in general.
    • specutils_cos – Functions specific to COS spectra.
    • specutils_stis – Functions specific to STIS spectra.
  • After The Fact: Diagnostic Modules.
    • make_html – Utility functions used in plotting HST spectra in general.
